subject: Hello
body:
Hello
Compliments of the season. How are you and your family? I have an acute financial business proposal that will be very beneficial to you, it is a huge investment moment in your country.
Please let me know if you are  interested.
Vladimir Boatic
Reply to: 
technocontractors@gmail.com

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Vladimir Boatic,

It's a pleasure to meet you. I hope you and your family are doing well too. Your proposal sounds interesting, could you please provide more details about it? What kind of investment are we talking about? And why do you think my country would be a good fit for this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
George

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Dear George,

I want to first express my gratitude for your prompt response. Once again,
my name is Vladimir Baotic, relative to the president of Russia, Vladimir
Putin.
I am an oil merchant trading within Europe and Africa markets in the area
of supplying refined products from Russia. Due to the ongoing Ukrainian
invasion by Russia,
The international community has sanctioned Russia and blocked all
international swift transfer to other Countries. As a result of the swift
sanction, it has become impossible to transfer money out of Russia to any
other Country. I therefore withdrew a large sum of money (US$30Million)
from our various bank accounts, and moved the money out of Russia for
safety purposes. Currently the money has been safely deposited in a private
Financial/security company in the United Arab Emirates.

Putin has placed an embargo on all Russian veterans from traveling out of
the Country, as a veteran, I am not able to travel out to claim the money,
hence I am
soliciting your cooperation to stand as my business partner to receive the
money from the Financial/security company on my behalf. There is a
Financial Consultant who is well known to my family and I have contacted
him on this matter, so he will direct you on what to do to receive the
money on my behalf.

Please Send your information which I will forward to the consultant so that
when you contact him, he will know you are the right person that will work
with him.

Most importantly I need you to please furnish me with areas of lucrative
investment in your country and especially an area where you have vast
experience.

NOTE: For your participation in this transaction, you will be compensated
with 20% of the total fund while you will invest the 80% for my Family. We
have agreed with the Consultant that his fee will be paid after his work is
completed but the Consultant informed me that there are normally some legal
documents to be prepared to enable you to claim the deposit from the
Financial House.

Required information:

1. Your full names and address as stated in your international Passport

2. Your private phone number

3. Your Occupation

4. A copy of your identification

On receipt of your information, I will forward the information to the
Consultant to draft a memorandum of understanding(MOU) and he will be
communicating directly with you to send you a draft copy of memorandum of
understanding for your perusal before we proceed..

Awaiting your urgent reply
Best Regards
Vladimir Boatic

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Vladimir Boatic,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. It sounds like a complex situation you're in, and I'm sorry to hear about the difficulties you're facing due to the current political climate.

I must admit, I'm not very familiar with international finance or the intricacies of oil trading. However, I am always open to learning new things and helping where I can. 

You mentioned a financial consultant who is well known to your family. Could you tell me more about him? What's his name? How long has he been working in this field?

As for lucrative investments in my country, I believe real estate and technology startups are quite promising at the moment. But again, I'm no expert in these matters.

Regarding your request for personal details, I hope you understand that it's important for me to maintain my privacy online. Is there another way we could proceed without sharing such sensitive information?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
George

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Vladimir Boatic,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing this information. It sounds like a challenging situation you're in, and I'm glad to hear that the funds are safe in the United Arab Emirates.

I'm curious about how you found my contact information and why you chose me as your potential business partner. Could you please share more details about this?

Also, could you provide more information about the Financial Consultant? What is his name and what company does he work for? 

As for investment opportunities, there are many sectors that could be profitable. However, it would be helpful if I knew more about your interests or any specific areas you're looking into.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
George

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Vladimir Boatic,

Thank you for reaching out and explaining your situation. It sounds like a complex and challenging circumstance you're in. I'm sorry to hear about the difficulties you're facing due to the sanctions on Russia.

I must admit, I'm not very familiar with international finance or the legalities involved in such transactions. However, I am always open to learning new things and helping where I can.

Could you please provide more information about this process? What exactly does it entail? And how would my involvement benefit both of us?

Also, could you tell me more about this Financial Consultant? How long have they been working with your family? 

As for investment opportunities, there are many sectors that could be profitable. Real estate, technology, healthcare, and renewable energy are all booming industries right now. But again, I'd need more details about your preferences and risk tolerance before making any specific recommendations.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
George

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Vladimir Boatic,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing this information. It sounds like a challenging situation you're in, and I'm glad to hear that you've found a way to keep your funds safe.

I must admit, I'm not very familiar with the intricacies of international finance or the legalities involved in such transactions. However, I am interested in learning more about it. Could you perhaps explain a bit more about how this process works? 

Also, could you tell me more about the role of the Financial Consultant? What kind of experience does he have in these matters? And what exactly would my responsibilities be as your business partner?

As for investment opportunities, there are many sectors that could be profitable. Real estate is always a good option, as well as technology startups or renewable energy projects. But again, I'm no expert and it would probably be best to consult with a professional financial advisor.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
George

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Vladimir Boatic,

Thank you for reaching out and explaining your situation. It sounds like a complex and challenging circumstance you're in. I'm sorry to hear about the difficulties you're facing due to the sanctions on Russia.

I must admit, I'm not very familiar with international finance or business investments, but I'm always eager to learn new things. Could you perhaps explain more about how this process works? What does it mean to stand as a business partner in this context?

Also, could you tell me more about the Financial Consultant? How long have they been working with your family? And what kind of legal documents are usually required for such transactions?

As for investment opportunities, I think it would be best if we discuss that further once we understand each other better. 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
George

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Dear Mr. George,

Thank you for your response to my mail of financial business proposal. I
want you to please understand that my intention is to get a trusted and
honest individual or company who will act as my partner in receiving huge
funds of money for future investment in a lucrative business in your
country.

I quite understand that we may not have met before or done business
together before now; I got your details after a brief search through the
internet after the sudden predicament  we found ourselves in our country.
There will be legal documentations to back up the movement of funds.

I am relying on the consultant whom I have discussed with and since the fud
is in safe deposit in UAE, we can proceed in confidentiality to process and
procure the movement of fund into your nominated account in your country
after we have communicated in detail and sign a memorandum of
understanding to enable us work together in all honesty.

You mentioned real estate which I also know has become a world business
phenomenon; I quite agree that we should look towards real estate
and invest the fund in it. Can you handle a financial business investment
of a huge sum as 30 million United States dollars without problems in your
country? Please let me know your position and send me the details I
requested in my last mail to you.

My kind regards and greetings to your family.

Vladimir.

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Vladimir,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite an interesting proposal you have there. I'm glad to hear that there will be legal measures in place to ensure the smooth movement of funds.

I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these types of transactions, but I'm eager to learn more about it. Could you perhaps explain a bit more about how this process works? How does the fund move from UAE to my country?

Also, regarding the real estate investment, could you provide some insights on what kind of properties we should be looking at? Are there any specific areas or types of real estate that would yield better returns?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
George

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Dear George,

I received your mail and I believe at this point you should please furnish
me with the details I earlier requested for; in order for us to proceed
with the financial business transaction.

Your full names
Your complete address
Occupation
Copy of your international passport or identification card
Your direct or private telephone number

Thanks and regards to your family.

Vladimir

subject: Re: Hello
body:
Hello Vladimir,

Thank you for your email. I'm excited to learn more about this financial business opportunity. Could you please provide me with more details about it? What exactly does it entail and how can I contribute?

As for the information you requested, I must apologize but I am not comfortable sharing such personal details over email. Is there another way we could verify my identity that doesn't involve sharing sensitive information?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
George
